definition: a small rope (one of several) used to draw a sail in, to haul fish aboard with a small net
details:
noun
- a small rope (one of several) used to draw a sail in
- a small net used to draw fish into a boat
verb
- to haul fish aboard with a small net
= example: to haul fish aboard with a small net
- to take in a sail with a brail
= example: to take in a sail with a brail
